name: Notion Smarter Decision Making (10-10-10 Rule)
description: Why do we make decisions we regret? And how can we make better choices?Making Better Decisions with the 10–10–10 RuleMaking better decisions is not hard. You need to think about the long-term consequences instead of short-term emotions. To help you do this, you can use the 10-10-10 rule.The 10-10-10 rule can be applied to nearly any decision you face, whether it's small or large, personal or professional, and whether it occurs daily or once in a lifetime.
